snippet.title: FEE3 2023: An Unexpected Caller by Team Soft Serve
snippet.description:
An Unexpected Caller is a telephone hack that inverses the design goals of the standard telephone, using vanilla characters and maps with custom class and item stats. The major appeal of the game is seeing how certain "vanillaisms" get carried over, while also seeing how maps are cropped, switched, or otherwise remixed to provide something fresh and exciting.

The map shown here is Chapter 8 of the project. This map was made by bpat and uses FE7's New Resolve as a base.
